mapper.select: -- Version3CompatibleLogicImpl 法人一覧 情報取得SQLファイル SELECT MAC_CCOMPANYID_CK,PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_COMP_NAME(MAC_CCUSTOMERID_CK_FK,MAC_CCOMPANYID_CK,TO_DATE(${date},${language})) AS MAC_CCOMPANYNAME FROM MAST_COMPANY WHERE MAC_CCUSTOMERID_CK_FK = #{custId} AND MAC_DSTART <= TO_DATE(#{date}) AND MAC_DEND >= TO_DATE(#{date}) AND MAC_CLANGUAGE = 'ja' AND MAC_CDELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY MAC_CCOMPANYID_CK

-- 法人検索対象範囲による法人一覧取得 SELECT MAST_COMPANY.MAC_CCUSTOMERID_CK_FK as HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK, MAST_COMPANY.MAC_CCOMPANYID_CK as HD_CCOMPANYID_CK FROM MAST_COMPANY WHERE
MAST_COMPANY.MAC_DSTART <= SYSDATE AND MAST_COMPANY.MAC_DEND >= SYSDATE
MAST_COMPANY.MAC_DSTART <= #{searchDate} AND MAST_COMPANY.MAC_DEND >= #{searchDate}
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM HIST_DESIGNATION WHERE HIST_DESIGNATION.HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK = MAST_COMPANY.MAC_CCUSTOMERID_CK_FK AND HIST_DESIGNATION.HD_CCOMPANYID_CK = MAST_COMPANY.MAC_CCOMPANYID_CK
AND HIST_DESIGNATION.HD_DSTARTDATE_CK <= SYSDATE AND HIST_DESIGNATION.HD_DENDDATE >= SYSDATE
AND HIST_DESIGNATION.HD_DSTARTDATE_CK <= #{searchDate} AND HIST_DESIGNATION.HD_DENDDATE >= #{searchDate}
-- existsSql AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT SR_0.ME_CUSERID AS EX_ME_CUSERID FROM MAST_EMPLOYEES SR_0 WHERE SR_0.ME_DSTARTDATE <= #{searchDate} AND SR_0.ME_DENDDATE >= #{searchDate} AND ( ( ( 'A' = 'A' ) ) ) ) EXSISTB WHERE EXSISTB.EX_ME_CUSERID = HIST_DESIGNATION.HD_CUSERID ) AND ( HIST_DESIGNATION.HD_CUSERID IN ( SELECT ME_CUSERID FROM MAST_EMPLOYEES WHERE ME_CCUSTOMERID_CK = '01' AND ME_DSTARTDATE <= TO_DATE( #{searchDate},'YYYY/MM/DD') AND ME_DENDDATE >= TO_DATE( #{searchDate},'YYYY/MM/DD') AND ME_CIFSTILLEMPLOYEDID = '0' ) ) ) ) ORDER BY MAST_COMPANY.MAC_CCOMPANYID_CK

-- 有効な法人リストを取得 SELECT MAC_CCOMPANYID_CK AS HD_CCOMPANYID_CK FROM MAST_COMPANY WHERE MAC_CCUSTOMERID_CK_FK = #{custId} AND MAC_CLANGUAGE = 'ja'
AND MAC_DSTART <= SYSDATE AND MAC_DEND >= SYSDATE
AND MAC_DSTART <= #{searchDate} AND MAC_DEND >= #{searchDate}
AND (MAC_CDELFLAG = '0' OR (
MAC_CDELFLAG = '1' AND MAC_DDELDATE > SYSDATE)
MAC_CDELFLAG = '1' AND MAC_DDELDATE > #{searchDate})
) ORDER BY MAC_NSEQ
